Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna Leeman
Reviews.Content: I have been using Nikon Cool Pix (point and shoot) for 3 years and as a amateur photographer I was so excited to receive this camera!! It came with so many accessories and they will all be put to good use! I couldn't ask for more and would definitely would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: CraigF
Reviews.Content: nice package, excellent device, looking forward to enjoying this for years.  Haven't used an SLR since the 35mm days, but this one is making the learning curve much easier.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Tom Tozier
Reviews.Content: Product was just as advertised and came in a timley fassion.would recommend this product best price on a package deal

Reviews.Title: a gift
Reviews.Author: paeng
Reviews.Content: a gift that came true to the one that least expected it. surprised at the moment she received the package.
